dict.acceptation: 黄油；黄油状的食品；奉承话；焊膏；
抹黄油于…上；用黄油煎食物；讨好；

sent.orig: Betty put some better butter into her bitter butter to make the bitter butter better.
sent.trans: 贝蒂在她的发苦的奶油中加进一些好的奶油，使那发苦的奶油变得好些。

sent.orig: How about butter? How do you use a butter knife?
sent.trans: 那奶油昵？奶油刀怎么用啊？

sent.orig: Peanut Butter If you want a healthy heart, spread your morning toast with peanut butter.
sent.trans: 如果你想有一个健康的心脏，那你每天早上就在烤面包上涂一层花生酱。

sent.orig: This butter is domestic, but it is in no way inferior to foreign butter.
sent.trans: 这黄油是国产的，但是它根本不次于外国产的黄油。

sent.orig: Opinion poll show that the public preferred butter show that the public preferred butter to margarine.
sent.trans: 民意调查表明，公众更喜欢黄油而不是人造奶油。
